sourceLocation.label: Source Location
sourceLocation.description: This is a contextual string added when this configuration object is processed.
sourceLocation.brief: Contextual string added when this configuration object is processed

title.label: Title
title.description: The title of the application.  This is used as the title of the Adaptive Framework Web App and is available for use in other places as appropriate.

qualifiedVariables.label: Qualified Variables
qualifiedVariables.description:
The name of each property in this object corresponds to a qualifier that is available in processing associated with this application.  The qualifier can not be an empty string.  The properties of these "qualifier objects" are hybrid values that are accessible as qualified variables.  These variables are evaluated once per scope as they are accessed.

Some qualifiers are restricted.

layoutsAdaptorId.label: Layouts Adaptor
layoutsAdaptorId.description: This is the adaptorId that locates Adaptive Layout Component objects.
layoutsAdaptorId.brief: The default adaptorId to select for layout component objects

extensions.label: Extensions
extensions.description: This is a list of extensionId of extensions to load at startup.  Each extensionId must be the objectId of an object in /afw/_AdaptiveManifest_/.
extensions.brief: List of extensions to load at startup

defaultModelAdaptorId.label: Default Model Adaptor
defaultModelAdaptorId.description: When presented with multiple model adaptors, this is the default adaptorId to use.  This will be the default selected adaptor chosen by user interface components.
defaultModelAdaptorId.brief: The default adaptorId to select for model storage

defaultFlags.label: Default Flags
defaultFlags.description: This is a list of the flagId of default flags that will be set when a scope (request) is created.  Flags in this list that are not yet registered will be set as a default when/if they are registered.  Each registered flagId is the objectId of an object in /afw/_AdaptiveFlag_/.
defaultFlags.brief: List of default flags to be set when a scope (request) is created.

defaultAdaptorId.label: Default Adaptor
defaultAdaptorId.description: This is the adaptorId chosen by default for user interface select components.
defaultAdaptorId.brief: This is the adaptorId chosen by default for user interface select components

confAdaptorId.label: Conf Adaptor
confAdaptorId.description:
This is the optional adaptorId of the running adaptor that contains configuration related objects.  This property can only be specified in the type=application entry of the conf file.

The runtime /afw/_AdaptiveApplication_/current object will consist of properties from the type=application entry of the conf file plus unique properties from the optional /<confAdaptorId>/_AdaptiveConf_application/<applicationId> object.

All services defined by _AdaptiveServiceConf_ objects in <confAdaptorId> with startup "permanent" or "immediate" will be started when the type=application conf entry is processed.
confAdaptorId.brief: Optional adaptorId of the running adaptor that contains configuration related objects

authorizationControl.label: Authorization
authorizationControl.description: This defines how authorization checking occurs in this application.
authorizationControl.brief: This defines how authorization checking occurs in this application

applicationId.label: Application
applicationId.description: This is id of the application.  The default applicationId is "application".  This property can only be specified in the type=application entry of the conf file.
applicationId.brief: This is the id of the application

description:
Adaptive Framework configuration component for type=application.  There is only one application conf entry per Adaptive Framework instance.

Use path /afw/_AdaptiveConf_application/current to access this entry at run time.
